name: Substrate
headline: Artificial Intelligence for your medical billing team
description: Substrate's AI agents automate the click-work & data entry in revenue cycle management. Our agents perform repetitive and time-consuming tasks on behalf of medical billers, significantly increasing efficiency and reducing errors.

founders.name: Inderpal Singh, Founder
founders.description: Building artificial intelligence for medical billers at Substrate (YC S24). Previously lead and built special projects teams at AngelList and HotelTonight

founders.name: Ayo Omojola, Founder
founders.description:
Currently: Chief Product Officer at Carbon Health.
Previously
- Founder @Mailform.io
- Founder @Hipmob (YC W12).

# Artificial intelligence for your medical billing team
Substrate's AI agents automate the click-work & data entry in revenue cycle management
[Book a Demo![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)](https://www.substrate.cc/<https:/tally.so/r/wLG1Zv>)

billing management

Adjudicated Claims
DENIALS
1.76%
CLEAN CLAIMS
Our agents perform repetitive and time-consuming tasks, significantly increasing efficiency and reducing errors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93edd_icon-future-white.svg)
Comprehensive Eligibility
Other solutions check a patient's eligibility via the Clearinghouse. Substrate does 5 distinct tasks for you:
  * Real time eligibility via EDI, plus verification via payor portal
  * **Coverage detection:** avoid coordination of benefits issues
  * Patient estimates: estimate patient costs prior to the visit
  * Enrollment check: avoid out of network denials due to enrollment 
  * Prior Auth check: know which procedures require prior auth.

[Learn More![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)](https://www.substrate.cc/</automated-medical-necessity-and-denial-management>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66e0b2534a33981d52f97608_Aetna-Logo-768x196.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66e127fdaa91640cac200228_66e0e246db40afa668f9c476_sun.svg)
✓
Eligibility Missing
Verifying Eligibility...
Eligibility Verified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ed7_icon-warehouse-white.svg)
Claims & Denials 
Substrate's AI-powered denials and claims management system works with your practice management system to proactively identify and resolve issues to maximize reimbursement. Here's how it works:
  * Automated claims monitoring for no-response claims
  * Validation of EOBs/ERA vs. Payor Portals, vs Practice Management system
  * Validation of claim & denials vs external sources including find-a doctor portals, contract rates, correspondences, CLIA licenses & more. 
  * See contract rates in line with allowed amounts & claim payment data

[Learn More![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)](https://www.substrate.cc/</automated-medical-necessity-and-denial-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ed7_icon-warehouse-white.svg)
Put Medical Necessity on Autopilot
Substrate's AI-powered medical necessity solution helps practices that experience pended and denied medical necessity claims proactively resolve medical necessity issues. Here's how it works
  * Review prior auths every day to make sure all applicable visits have a valid prior authorization on file
  * Automatically apply for prior authorization via payor portal or by fax
  * Automatically compares medical record documents to prior authorizations, to ensure services rendered are medically necessary and in line with the prior auth, including effective dates, dosage, diagnosis codes and more
  * Continuously monitor outgoing claims that are pended for medical records, and automatically submit the correct medical record + prior authorization instantly
  * Automatically file appeals for denied claims + sync confirmation numbers back to your practice management system

[Learn More![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)](https://www.substrate.cc/</automated-medical-necessity-and-denial-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ec4_icon-navigation-white.svg)
Billing Copilot
Substrate's Billing Copilot multiplies each individual biller's productivity by:
  * Showing each individual biller their queues, with smart sorting so they focus on the most urgent first
  * Prefilling common payor portals like Availity & United so billers don't have to copy/paste
  * Enabling faster eligibility and claim status checks than is possible manually

[Learn More![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)![Right arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93f59_icon-arrow-right-white.svg)](https://www.substrate.cc/</automated-medical-necessity-and-denial-management>)
Substrate integrates seamlessly with your existing systems, ensuring a smooth transition and minimal disruption
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ebb_icon-swap.svg)
Seamless to Integrate
Onboarding Substrate is as easy as adding a new employee to your team. With just login credentials, our AI agents can navigate any EMR or portal to retrieve data and context.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ea5_icon-robotic-arm.svg)
Contextual Knowledge
By leveraging unstructured information such as contracts, our agents can make informed decisions and provide valuable insights to optimize your revenue cycle management.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66db47de37dc553fabb93ebf_icon-layers.svg)
Real-Time Agent Tracking
Gain real-time visibility into agent performance, workload, and results, empowering you to make data-driven decisions and continuously improve your billing processes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66db47dd37dc553fabb93e2c/66dfeb62671227cb07557187_logo_large_white.svg)
Always On Intelligence
Our agents operate continuously in your workflows 
30X
Substrate's agents boosts biller productivity by up to 30x, streamlining revenue operations with greater precision
60%
Our artificial intelligence catches up to 60% more errors before claims are processed, reducing costly denials and mistakes 
40%
Substrate agents autonomously fight claims decreasing denials by up to 40%, merging velocity with savings
Ready to learn more?
Contact us to learn more about how our artificial intelligent agents can improve your revenue cycle operations

generated_description:
**Substrate: Revolutionizing Medical Billing with AI**

Founded in 2024 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Substrate is blazing a trail in the healthcare industry with its cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions tailored for medical billing teams. The mission? To automate the mundane click-work and data entry involved in revenue cycle management, allowing billers to focus on more strategic tasks while significantly boosting efficiency and reducing errors.

With a compact team of just two—impressive for a startup—the company is already making waves. Located in a yet undisclosed location, they’re guided by the expertise of Garry Tan, a notable group partner in the Y Combinator ecosystem.

### What Substrate Offers

Substrate’s AI-powered agents tackle the repetitive tasks that plague medical billing processes:

- **Increased Productivity:** Imagine a system that boosts individual biller's output by up to **30 times**. That’s exactly what Substrate promises, allowing teams to operate with greater speed and accuracy.
- **Error Reduction:** Their advanced AI can catch up to **60% more errors** before submissions, drastically slashing the potential for costly claims denials.
- **Claims Management:** Autonomously handling claims and proactively resolving issues, Substrate allows practices to maximize reimbursements by validating claims against various sources.
- **Prior Authorization Automation:** The company ensures that every visit has a valid prior authorization by continuously monitoring and applying automatically when necessary.

What makes Substrate particularly appealing is its **seamless integration** with existing systems. The onboarding process is as easy as inviting a new employee—simply provide the login credentials, and their AI agents will navigate any EMR or portal with ease.

### Why It Matters

Healthcare billing is notoriously tedious and fraught with challenges. Substrate steps in at a critical junction, addressing these pain points with intelligent solutions. From verifying patient eligibility to managing complex denials, they aim to redefine what’s possible in medical billing.

The potential for savings and efficiency in a sector that cannot afford errors is substantial. By putting medical necessity on autopilot, billing teams can respond to issues faster and maintain high standards of patient care with less overhead.

As Substrate continues to grow, it’s clear they’re on a mission to transform the landscape of medical billing through smart automation and AI. With backers like Y Combinator, their journey is one to watch.

For those keen to explore how Substrate can enhance their medical billing operations, further information and demos can be found on their [website](https://www.substrate.cc/).
